name: Fairy Mix
description:
► Fairy Mix is a Match-3 super hit! You haven’t seen such a puzzle before: flying platforms, magical portals, destructive cannons, and enchanted bees.

► 15 locations, 1000 levels, and even more await you beyond the portal of Fairy Land.

► The fascinating thriller where little sorceress Jeannie defends Fairy Land from the intrigues of the evil witch Vivienne de Legrand.

► More than 30 abandoned mines and workshops as well as 15 ruined buildings on the estate. Banish the evil, collect the resources, restore the estate, and receive bonuses for the game.

► Use a powerful booster, spin the Wheel of Fortune, and get valuable gifts from the daily bonus!

► Invite your friends to the game, compete with them, help them to pass difficult levels, and receive lives from them!
